Name: Will - Mighty Colossus
Description: Imprinted with the battle consciousness of the troll, can be used to create Battle Imagine - Mighty Colossus.
Description$english: Imprinted with the battle consciousness of the troll, can be used to create Battle Imagine - Mighty Colossus.
Description2$english: Battle Imagine is the crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram combined, possessing supernatural powers.
